full_text: This could lead to a run on Russia’s banks and currency, and will cause shudders in global markets and a further spike in energy prices. It may also trigger Russian retaliation  https://t.co/gOKVpcSTCL

localize.full_text: これはロシアの銀行や通貨の暴落を招き、世界市場を震撼させ、エネルギー価格のさらなる高騰をもたらすだろう。また、ロシアの報復を誘発する可能性もある https://t.co/gOKVpcSTCL
